--Scryed--

With a blurry eye'd blink, Scryed's white optics open for the first 
time in many years. Her first glances around show that she is 
trapped inside of her pod, which seems to have been activated. She 
fumbles around with the interior controls, and hits the open button 
for the pod only to find that the door only opens a few centimeters. 

"Curses..." she says, as she stretches her blackish red fringed arms 
downward to grasp the slightly open edge of the pod's door. Her 
black hands tighten as she grips the door tightly, and pushes at the 
door with all her strength.

Slowly, the door inches its way open, and the pod slides backward in 
response to force. Scryed continues to push at the door, slowly 
opening it.

After several minutes of pushing, she manages to make enough space 
to worm her way out of the pod. She drags herself out, and stands 
up. As she tries to look around her, she almost falls, but catches 
herself on the pod. Her computer systems had almost returned to full 
functionability.
